examples:
What kind of problem?: Other

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I DIDNT SUBSCRIBE TO ANY OFFER YOU HAVE BUT WHY DID YOU LESS IT ON MY PAYPAL ACC???

What do you need help with ?: I signed up for Canva Pro. In the app store you are listed as a subscriber, I even called Apple to confirm. As with my cell phone signatures, it also appears. However, when I use items picked up, they ask me to buy them. Then I click on subscribe again and say I'm a subscriber. He asks if I want to renew from January 10, 2022. What do I do ??? I want to continue using ... I have already sent a message before. I didn't find a support phone.

thanks precious

What kind of problem?: Other

Can you help please? I have waited weeks for this to be resolved? I have flagged this problem to three different people on the help email and yet haven't had it resolved.  Can you refund me for the canna pro that I have paid for, for two months.  I will have to cancel my subscription if I don't get it resolved asap.  Do you have a contact number that I can call to discuss? Thanks
